data.title: Howard Hughes - Bennet Group
data.meta_description: Bennet Group provides public relations support to The Howard Hughes Corporation for its plans to create an urban master planned […]
data.meta_site_name: Bennet Group | Strategic Communications | PR | Hawaii
data.text: Bennet Group provides public relations support to The Howard Hughes Corporation for its plans to create an urban master planned community in Kaka‘ako. The plans will transform Ward Centers into Ward Village, a vibrant neighborhood featuring unique retail experiences and exceptional residences set among dynamic open spaces and pedestrian-friendly streets. Through strategic media relations assistance, Bennet Group works to position Howard Hughes as a leader in the evolution of Kaka‘ako, and highlight how Kaka‘ako will be a thriving and vibrant community that residents and visitors alike will enjoy and want to be a part of. The Howard Hughes Corporation has an exciting opportunity to maximize its strategic assets at Ward Centers by leveraging this unique complex of shops and restaurants located at a world-class location to be the premier shopping, dining and entertainment center in the state. As Ward Centers continues to move “ForWard,” Bennet Group provides ongoing communications, media relations and social media support.
